remarks: The distributive property for series.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
statement:
seqdistr.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x .+ y ) e. S ) $.
seqdistr.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( C T ( x .+ y ) ) = ( ( C T x ) .+ ( C T y ) ) ) $.
seqdistr.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
seqdistr.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( G ` x ) e. S ) $.
seqdistr.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` x ) = ( C T ( G ` x ) ) ) $.
seqdistr $p |- ( ph -> ( seq M ( .+ , F ) ` N ) = ( C T ( seq M ( .+ , G ) ` N ) ) ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d F x $.
$d G x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d T x y $.
$d ph x y $.
